ENABLE_DAPP_SECURITY_WARNINGS.description: Enable security warnings for dApp interactions

ENABLE_PHISHING_DETECTION.description: Enable phishing detection for dApp URLs

ENABLE_ORIGIN_VALIDATION.description: Enable origin validation for dApp connections

ENABLE_ZKAUTH_WALLET.description: Enable ZKAuth wallet creation and social login options

FORCE_INTRO.description: Force intro flow even if already shown
